recommendations: High urban development intensity - significant groundwater impact expected
Implement stormwater management and infiltration systems
Monitor groundwater quality quarterly for contamination indicators
Good natural infiltration - minimize paving and impervious cover

Maintain 30m setback from potential contamination sources
